## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (87f79436f45c0461f085eafc8a6bd72a2fe223a7d9e70924bdede4a4f540defe)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cdp-agentkit-nodejs' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
